author: Joseph Wulfsohn
title: Bill Maher blasts 'PC' uproar over 'Chinese virus' label: 'We SHOULD blame China'
description: "Real Time" host Bill Maher slammed the "PC police" Friday night for overreacting to the "Chinese virus" labeling controversy.
content:
